articles.title: Hong Kong police raid prodemocracy news outlet and arrest six current and former executives  CNN
articles.description: Hong Kong's national security police have arrested six people associated with prodemocracy media outlet Stand News — including pop star Denise Ho — and raided its office, raising further concerns about diminishing press freedoms in the city.
